product_name: BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Britax Seats
long_description: This BOB Infant car seat adapter lets you conveniently take your infant from the car to your BOB stroller without having to remove your child from your Britax car seat. Seat adapter is easily installed or removed, and folds with the stroller for convenience; restraint belt secures infant car seat in place. Works with the Britax(R) B-SAFE and CHAPERONE car seats. Compatible with BOB single strollers that feature the Accessory Adapter. Because of the higher center of gravity it creates, the BOB Infant car seat adapter is intended for walking use only. BOB recommends that you consult with your pediatrician regarding the suitability of stroller use with your child as each child develops at a different rate.
short_description: This BOB Infant car seat adapter lets you conveniently take your infant from the car to your BOB stroller without having to remove your child from your Britax car seat.
